attributes.desc: Specifies the URL (external) or path (internal) to the image file.
This is crucial for accessibility and SEO, and also provide alternative text for the image if not displayed.
Define the dimensions of the image. You can use pixels (`width="300"`) or percentages (`width="50%"`).
Displays a tooltip with additional information when the user's mouse hovers over the image.
Specifies how the browser should load the image. `lazy` (for lazy loading) and `eager` (for immediate loading).

RImage.desc: Allow to specify different images for different screen sizes or resolutions.
Defines multiple image sources for different screen resolutions.
